item.title: 【Requests】[REQ AUD] - Various Live Audio / Video 1970's to early 2000's
item.description:
THIS IS THE WANT LIST FROM THE IJWTHSTD BLOG, most total long shot but you never know


**ETERNAL WANT LIST**

In this total media universe with everything at my fingertips, individual shows have taken on a lot less importance, however I still want to get my eyes and ears on these.

This was copied off a much older list where I deleted several found titles so it's not impossible

I'd say I have plenty to trade but I stopped withholding stuff for those purposes years ago.

Remember your hoarded recordings are only worth something while there are still people alive who care.

Therapy? @ Whisky A Go Go Nov 1992 (this was recorded)
Therapy @ The Roxy 5/4/96 (saw this on a list of Westwood One shows, likely never broadcast, can't even find a reference to it now)
The Breeders @ The Casbah 5/12/97 Westwood One saw on same list
GROTUS GENT, BELGIUMEMOCRAZ 4/24/94 saw it on a list
ZODIAC MINDWARP AND THE LOVE REACTION-VARIETY ARTS CENTER LA 12/?/87 saw it on a list
LUSH-KCRW MORNING BECOMES ECLECTIC 8/9/94
SUPERGRASS Troubadour 5/23/00
JESUS JONES @ JACKSONVILLE, FL 2002 - this show was webcast and recorded but was never able to find it
RAMONES-SANTA CLARA,CA 7/5/89 ** always interested in Ramones masters / previously uncirculated / LA shows
THE HUMPERS - anything I don't have especially the video master of the Moguls 1998 show with the guest keyboardist. The Neckbones also played and I don't have anything by them either
GROTUS - anything I don't have
THE HANGMEN - anything I don't have
IRON MAIDEN-AUBURN HILLS, MI 1991 PRO VIDEO with sound
BOWIE/NIN-AUBURN HILLS,MI 1995 PRO VIDEO (this exists but was never released, does anyone have the ability to bribe the guy who has it?)
ANTHRAX TROUBADOUR,HOLLYWOOD 5/15/93 **saw this on a list a long time ago, shoulda bought it...
GROTUS SAN FRANCISCO, CA 4/20/92 (they are on the credits of the video of the Mr Bungle headline set so this may exist somewhere)
GROTUS HOUSTON 5/2/96
MELANIE C 2020 webcast
ROLLING STONES New Orleans, LA 7/13/78 video something better than the circulating 20th generation version
AEROSMITH Pontiac Silverdome May 1976 audio or video (both apparently recorded)


These are more of a long shot, shows I attended or heard about and would love to have in my collection:

DICKIES-KNITTING FACTORY 11/16/07
THROW RAG- early shows (94-99)
AEROSMITH FORUM 12/18/03 *complete* 5 song soundcheck or DVD of gig
FASTER PUSSYCAT SOUTH BEND,IN 8/25/02 (ESPECIALLY VIDEO)
GROTUS CELEBRITY THEATRE,ANAHEIM,CA 4/17/92
GERALDINE FIBBERS-LAS PALMAS THEATRE, HOLLYWOOD 6/28/95
SUEDE-EL REY THEATRE 5/21/97 CLEAN COPY / DIFFERENT SOURCE THAN MINE
SUEDE-EL REY THEATRE 5/22/97
HALFORD-HOUSE OF BLUES 2/2/03 CLEAN COPY
MELVINS-WHISKY A GO GO 3/4/93
AEROSMITH-TOPEKA,KS 6/2/93
AEROSMITH-GREAT WESTERN FORUM 3/3/90 (complete, decent quality)
AEROSMITH-GREAT WESTERN FORUM 3/5/90
RAMMSTEIN Palace, Hollywood 4/27/98
L7 + 7 Year Bitch Fairfax High 4/10/93
THE ORB Mayan Theatre 5/1/98
L7 Garage 3/29/98 (I since found who filmed it but a matter of going to his house and helping him find it and resisting the temptation to bring a UHaul truck.)
BELLY Hollywood Palladium 4/29/95
BELLY Mayan Theatre 11/9/95 complete, or at least the encore
BELLY Dragonfly 11/10/95 this was recorded and was the last show until 2016, probably not a big deal now
SMASHING PUMPKINS Lollapalooza 9/5/94 I just scored an incomplete copy of the first 45 mins, still need the rest!
NICK CAVE AND THE BAD SEEDS Lollapalooza 9/5/94
MUDHONEY/COURTNEY LOVE/FLUID/RED HOT CHILI PEPPERS Hollywood Palladium 9/27/92
BABES IN TOYLAND Hollywood Palladium 1/22/93
BABES IN TOYLAND/CIRCLE JERKS PALACE 12/19/94
RAMONES Hollywood Palladium 10/14 & 16/92 (complete, last encore not recorded on 10/14) Hollywood Palladium 3/10/94, UCI Crawford Hall 3/12/94 (complete or at least the encores), Hollywood Palladium 8/29/95, Bakersfield Tejon Theatre 8/30/95
NY LOOSE Hollywood Palladium 8/29/95 (or anything really)
JUDAS PRIEST/MEGADETH/TESTAMENT LA Sports Arena 11/8/90 (now have Megadeth mostly complete set on video)
AC/DC Great Western Forum 11/13/88 complete
TESTAMENT/SAVATAGE/DARK ANGEL Celebrity Theatre 5/4/90
GWAR/DICKIES/EX COPS Hollywood Palladium 5/13/94
ANTHRAX Troubadour Feb 1990
ANTHRAX/FIGHT Hollywood Palladium 5/15/94
MR BUNGLE / GROTUS Ventura Theatre 4/19/92
MR BUNGLE Celebrity Theatre Anaheim, CA 4/17/92 - the existing recording is missing the encore
CHEAP TRICK - SOUTHERN CALIFORNIA/LA AREA SHOWS I DONT ALREADY HAVE OR HIGH QUALITY EARLY SHOWS & SOME UNDER REPRESENTED 80'S (prior to 2010, not going out of my way to find scab lineup)
JUDAS PRIEST/QUEENSRYCHE Irvine Meadows 7/8/05
THE GUN CLUB The Palace 12/18/95 possibly recorded and filmed
FASTER PUSSYCAT 1980's/early 1990's LA area shows + headline shows from 1992/1993 Whipped Tour
L.A. GUNS same
Guns N Roses + Michael Monroe @ Park Plaza 10/13/89
ALICE COOPER @ Cathouse 10/31/1989
ALICE COPOER @ Pantages 4/7/90 (not the completely unlistenable one)
MOTORHEAD California Dreams 1993-ish
IMPERIAL TEEN FM broadcasts / soundboards and the occasional LA show I might have missed, like Eagle Rock Music Festival
KISS @ The Forum Feb 23-24 1976
MEGADETH Ventura + Riverside 1990 (not the band filmed video) + Long Beach Arena 12/31/1992 + Perkins Palace 1988 and any LA shows Rust In Peace and prior I don't have
CHEAP TRICK 12/31/98
CHEAP TRICK Whisky A Go Go Feb 1990
CHEAP TRICK any more early Busted shows, particularly Japan ?
FAITH NO MORE old uncirculated masters, whatever that means
DEE DEE RAMONE - any shows from his 1999-2002 LA era I didn't tape (I taped 22)
RAMONES / DEE DEE RAMONE / FAITH NO MORE - notice almost nothing from Japan - there's gotta be some Japanese tapers sitting on these
"BEETHOVEN - HIS SPIRITUAL DEVELOPMENT" the complete series (I only have it in pieces)
"Lady Day: The Life And Times Of Billie Holiday," - another radio doc I caught in the middle of the night and wish I had
Judas Priest @ Jimmy Kimmel Live 2008 (complete)
Iggy & The Stooges @ Jimmy Kimmel Live 2007 (complete)
Garth Brooks @ Jimmy Kimmel Live 11/16/16 (complete)

Been to a lot of Jimmy Kimmel shows that I didn't record but these are the important ones

someone just has to have been recording all the gobs of KXLU in studio sets, I know there are a few Hangmen I have only heard about


+

this is from my friend who provided a massive amount of rare recordings (the person who wanted these died 6 days after this post but should they turn up I may listen in his memory)


THE FOLLOWING SHOWS WERE ATTENDED
THE FOLLOWING SHOWS WERE NOT RECORDED
MORE INFORMATION TO BE ADDED


WET WILLIE-ATLANTA RHYTHM SECTION-GRINDERSWITCH-02-22-NO YEAR-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

FOGHAT-RARE EARTH-05-00-NO YEAR-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

LEO KOTTKE-00-14-NO YEAR-…10:30 SHOW-THE GREAT SOUTHERN MUSIC HALL

WEATHER REPORT-05-04-NO YEAR-…8:00 SHOW-THE GREAT SOUTHERN MUSIC HALL

ELVIN BISHOP-00-00-76-JAI ALAI FRONTON

THE DOOBIE BROTHERS-MARSHALL TUCKER BAND-THE OUTLAWS-BAKER GURVITZ ARMY-04-05-75-TAMPA STADIUM

NEKTAR-04-20-75-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

UFO-10-31-75-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

THE OUTLAWS-FAT CHANCE-01-30-76-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

PETER FRAMPTON-GARY WRIGHT-03-12-76-ORLANDO SPORTS STADIUM

BAD COMPANY-KANSAS-03-30-76-LAKELAND CIVIC CENTER

B.B. KING-02-03-77-THE GREAT SOUTHERN MUSIC HALL

BENNY GOODMAN-00-00-NO YEAR-LONG BEACH TERRACE THEATER
item.author: ijwthstd
